Blackstorm:


In fact she was noticing that she was getting weak... She didn't 
realized until now that using her energy balls did that she was 
getting weak... and that didn't like her.

BLackstorm aimed and fired two feather missiles


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/27/03 5:33:57 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Blackstorm rolled to a side and fired three energy-balls against 
> > Maxima
> > 
> 
> Maxima did the same, as one energy ball barely caught her foot. 
> 
> She got half way up. "Excellent. Very well done. However, your 
energy 
> spheres.. you use them a lot. Surely this must force you low on 
power?" 
> 
> She stood & started to walk towards Blackstorm.
